eng: An OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number, post which you are required too set your MPIN.
mr: आपल्या नोंदणीकृत मोबाइल नंबरवर एक ओटीपी पाठविला जाईल जो आपण आपला एमपीन म्हणून सेट करणे आवश्यक आहे.
indic_trans_translated: An OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number, which you will have to set as your MPIN.

eng: Measles Containing vaccine (MCV)/MR-2JE-2**DiphtheriaPertussis & Tetanus (DPT)-Booster-1OPV –Booster
mr: गोवर (एमसीव्ही)/एमआर-2जेई-2**घटसर्पपेर्ट्युसिस आणि टिटॅनस (डीपीटी)-बूस्टर-1ओपीव्ही - बूस्टर
indic_trans_translated: Gower (MCV) / MR-2JE-2 * Ghatsarpupartosis and Tetanus (DPT) - Booster 1OPV - Booster

eng: The Poshan Tracker enables real-time monitoring and tracking of all AWCs and beneficiaries on defined indicators.
mr: पोषण ट्रॅकर सर्व अंगणवाडी केंद्रस् आणि लाभार्थ्यांचे रिअल-टाइम मॉनिटरिंग आणि परिभाषित निर्देशकांवर मागोवा ठेवण्यास सक्षम करते.
indic_trans_translated: POSHAN tracker enables real time monitoring of all Anganwadi Centres and beneficiaries and tracking on defined indicators.

eng: It is built using centralized data architecture that also aligns with the digital technology systems of other ministries and programs.
mr: हे केंद्रीकृत डेटा आर्किटेक्चर वापरून तयार केले गेले आहे जे इतर मंत्रालये आणि कार्यक्रमांच्या डिजिटल तंत्रज्ञान प्रणालींशी देखील संरेखित होते.
indic_trans_translated: It is built on a centralized data architecture that aligns with the digital technology systems of other ministries and programs.

eng: The public dashboard helps to impart transparency on services delivered to beneficiaries
mr: सार्वजनिक डॅशबोर्ड लाभार्थ्यांना दिल्या जाणार्या सेवांमध्ये पारदर्शकता आणण्यास मदत करतो
indic_trans_translated: The Public Dashboard helps in bringing transparency in the services provided to the beneficiaries

eng: Translations on the Poshan Tracker Portal & App Chabot are done by third party translators.
mr: पोषण ट्रॅकर पोर्टल आणि एप चॅबॉट वरील भाषांतर तृतीय पक्ष अनुवादकाद्वारे केले जाते.
indic_trans_translated: Translations on the POSHAN tracker portal and app chatbot are done by third party interpreters.

eng: While the translations are done on a best effort basis, some of the parts may be incorrect.
mr: भाषांतरे सर्वोत्कृष्ट प्रयत्नांच्या आधारावर केली जात असली तरी काही भाग चुकीचे असू शकतात.
indic_trans_translated: Though translations are based on best effort, they may be wrong in some respects.

eng: Certain files and other items on the website cannot be translated.
mr: वेबसाइटवरील काही फाइल्स आणि इतर गोष्टींचे भाषांतर केले जाऊ शकत नाही.
indic_trans_translated: Some of the files and other things on the website cannot be translated.

eng: In addition, on translation, some applications and/or services may not function as expected, due to language barriers.
mr: याव्यतिरिक्त, भाषांतरावर, भाषेच्या अडथळ्यांमुळे काही अनुप्रयोग आणि/किंवा सेवा अपेक्षेप्रमाणे कार्य करू शकत नाहीत.
indic_trans_translated: Additionally, on translation, some applications and / or services may not work as expected due to language barriers.

eng: We are working constantly to rectify any errors, omissions, or ambiguities in the translations provided on this portal.
mr: या पोर्टलवर प्रदान केलेल्या भाषांतरांमधील कोणत्याही त्रुटी, चूक किंवा अस्पष्टता सुधारण्यासाठी आम्ही सतत काम करत आहोत.
indic_trans_translated: We are constantly working to rectify any errors, errors or ambiguities in the translations provided on this portal.

eng: The MGRS collected primary growth data and related information from approximately 8500 children from widely different ethnic backgrounds and cultural settings (Brazil, Ghana, India, Norway, Oman and the USA)
mr: एमजीआरएसने मोठ्या प्रमाणावर भिन्न वांशिक पार्श्वभूमी आणि सांस्कृतिक सेटिंग्जमधील (ब्राझील, घाना, भारत, नॉर्वे, ओमान आणि यूएसए) अंदाजे 8500 मुलांकडून प्राथमिक वाढ डेटा आणि संबंधित माहिती गोळा केली
indic_trans_translated: MGRS collected primary growth data and related information from approximately 8500 children across a wide range of ethnic backgrounds and cultural settings (Brazil, Ghana, India, Norway, Oman and USA)

eng: Children of different age groups are monitored on monthly basis by AWWs.
mr: वेगवेगळ्या वयोगटातील मुलांचे मासिक आधारावर अंगणवाडी सेविकास् द्वारे निरीक्षण केले जाते.
indic_trans_translated: The children of different age groups are monitored on a monthly basis by Anganwadi Sevikas.

eng: Health indicators like Stunting, Wasting and Underweight prevalence are measured as per WHO standards.
mr: खुंटणे, अशक्तपणा आणि कमी वजनाचे प्रमाण यासारखे आरोग्य निर्देशक डब्ल्यूएचओ मानकांनुसार मोजले जातात.
indic_trans_translated: Health indicators such as stunting, anaemia and low birth weight are measured in accordance with WHO standards.

eng: Regular growth monitoring helps AWWs to provide relevant and timely assistance to children
mr: नियमित वाढीचे निरीक्षण केल्याने अंगणवाडी सेविका ला मुलांना संबंधित आणि वेळेवर सहाय्य प्रदान करण्यात मदत होते
indic_trans_translated: Regular monitoring of the growth of Anganwadi workers will help in providing relevant and timely support to the children

eng: Awareness for Children Stunting, Wasting to prevent malnutrition in children
mr: मुलांमधील कुपोषण टाळण्यासाठी बुटकेपणा, लूकडेपणा याबाबत जनजागृती
indic_trans_translated: Awareness on Stunting and Malnutrition among Children

eng: Poshan Tracker adds new application features
mr: पोशन ट्रॅकर नवीन ऍप्लिकेशन वैशिष्ट्ये जोडत आहे
indic_trans_translated: Adding new application features to the POSHAN tracker

eng: Making or Updating Home Visit Planner and Initiating home visits
mr: गृह- भेटीचे नियोजन बनवणे किंवा अपडेट करणे आणि गृह- भेटी सुरू करणे
indic_trans_translated: Planning or updating a home visit and starting home visits

eng: Poshan Calculator is designed to measure growth of the child based on standards defined by World Health Organization (WHO)
mr: पोषण कॅल्क्युलेटर हे मुलांची वाढ मोजण्यासाठी डिझाइन केलेले आहे जे जागतिक आरोग्य संघटनेने (डब्ल्यूएचओ) परिभाषित केलेल्या मानकांच्या आधारे मूल्यमापन करते
indic_trans_translated: The POSHAN calculator is designed to measure the growth of children which is evaluated on the basis of parameters defined by the World Health Organization (WHO)

eng: Migrated from one category to another
mr: एका श्रेणीतून दुसर्यात स्थलांतरित झाले
indic_trans_translated: Migrating from one category to another

eng: It usually occurs when a person has not had food of adequate quality and quantity and/or they have had frequent or prolonged illnesses
mr: हे सहसा तेव्हा होते जेव्हा एखाद्या व्यक्तीने पुरेशा दर्जाचे आणि प्रमाणात अन्न घेतले नसते आणि/किंवा त्यांना वारंवार किंवा दीर्घकाळापर्यंत आजार होत असतात
indic_trans_translated: This usually happens when a person does not take adequate quality and quantity of food and / or suffers from frequent or prolonged illness

eng: Poshan Abhiyaan is India’s flagship programme to improve nutritional outcomes for children, adolescents, pregnant women and lactating mothers by leveraging technology, a targeted approach and convergence.
mr: मुले, किशोरवयीन मुले, गर्भवती महिला आणि स्तनपान करणार्या मातांना तंत्रज्ञानाचा लाभ देऊन, लक्ष्यित दृष्टिकोन आणि अभिसरण देऊन पौष्टिक परिणाम सुधारण्यासाठी पोषण अभियान हा भारताचा प्रमुख कार्यक्रम आहे.
indic_trans_translated: POSHAN Abhiyaan is India's flagship programme to improve the nutritional outcomes of children, adolescents, pregnant women and lactating mothers by providing them access to technology, targeted approach and convergence.

eng: Hot Cooked Meal (HCM) given in last 30 days
mr: मागील ३० दिवसात दिलेली गरम शिजवलेले भोजन (एचसीएम)
indic_trans_translated: Hot Cooked Meals (HCM) served in last 30 days

eng: Uploading of Data of Anganwadi Services Schemes in Poshan Tracker
mr: पोषण ट्रॅकरमध्ये अंगणवाडी सेवा योजनांचा डेटा अपलोड करणे
indic_trans_translated: Uploading of Anganwadi Services data in POSHAN tracker

eng: The Poshan Tracker generates automated alerts to the critical last-mile beneficiaries.
mr: पोषण ट्रॅकर शेवटच्या टप्प्यातील गंभीर लाभार्थ्यांना स्वयंचलित सूचना व्युत्पन्न करतो.
indic_trans_translated: The POSHAN tracker generates automated notifications for critical beneficiaries in the last stage.

eng: It also ensures efficient audit of the delivery system by documenting real time attendance of beneficiaries and duty bearers.
mr: हे लाभार्थी आणि कर्तव्य धारकांच्या वास्तविक वेळेच्या उपस्थितीचे दस्तऐवजीकरण करून वितरण प्रणालीचे कार्यक्षम ऑडिट देखील सुनिश्चित करते.
indic_trans_translated: It also ensures an efficient audit of the distribution system by documenting the real time attendance of the beneficiaries and the duty holders.

eng: This management information system will help the nutrition programme to scale efficiently, thereby generating and documenting positive impact
mr: ही व्यवस्थापन माहिती प्रणाली पोषण कार्यक्रमास कार्यक्षमतेने मापन करण्यास मदत करेल, ज्यामुळे सकारात्मक प्रभाव निर्माण आणि दस्तऐवजीकरण होईल
indic_trans_translated: This Management Information System will help in effective measurement of POSHAN Abhiyaan, which will create a positive impact and document it

eng: How can one Download Poshan Tracker App?
mr: आपण पोशन ट्रॅकर अॅप डाउनलोड कसे करू शकतो?
indic_trans_translated: How to download the Poshan Tracker App?

eng: Clarification regarding Cost of Smart phones (03 June, 2021)
mr: स्मार्ट फोनच्या किंमतीबाबात स्पष्टीकरण (03 जून, 2021)
indic_trans_translated: Clarification on Price of Smartphones (June 03, 2021)

eng: along with status update once resolved
mr: निराकरण झाल्यानंतर स्थिती अपडेट सह
indic_trans_translated: With status update after resolution

eng: The Poshan Tracker system is regularly audited by auditors engaged by MWCD, for security and scalability of the system.
mr: प्रणालीच्या सुरक्षितता आणि मापनक्षमतेसाठी पोषण ट्रॅकर प्रणालीचे नियमितपणे एमडब्ल्यूसीडीद्वारे गुंतलेल्या ऑडिटर्सद्वारे ऑडिट केले जाते.
indic_trans_translated: The POSHAN tracker system is regularly audited by auditors engaged by MWCD for safety and scalability of the system.

eng: The records may be used for such audits.
mr: अशा ऑडिटसाठी नोंदी वापरल्या जाऊ शकतात.
indic_trans_translated: Records can be used for such audit.
